chapter.title: Multi Module Builds
chapter.para: This is a chapter about Multi-Module Builds MMB.

section.title: The Default (Simple) Multi-Module-Build
section.para:
Define the default of a MMB. Structure (folder layout) Version usage.
+-- parent (pom.xml) +--- module-1 (pom.xml) +--- module-2 (pom.xml) +--- module-3 (pom.xml) ... ... +--- module-n (pom.xml)

section.title: The Complex Multi-Module-Build
section.para: Structure (folder layout) Version usage. +-- parent (pom.xml) +--- module-1 (pom.xml) +--- module-1-1 (pom.xml) +--- module-1-2 (pom.xml) +--- module-2 (pom.xml) +--- module-3 (pom.xml) +--- module-3-1 (pom.xml) +--- module-3-2 (pom.xml) ... ... +--- module-n (pom.xml)

section.title: The Ugly Multi-Module-Build
section.para: Structure (folder layout) Version usage. +-- root (pom.xml) +--- parent (pom.xml) ... +--- module-1 (pom.xml) +--- module-2 (pom.xml) ... +--- module-n (pom.xml)
